content:
ContentAlignment Enum

Definition

Specifies how text is aligned in a window caption.

In this Article

public enum ContentAlignment
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ContentAlignment

Remarks

The ContentAlignment values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Center

The text is centered.
Left

The text is aligned to the left side.
Right

The text is aligned to the right side.
